resources.string: Welcome, to begin using Orbital LWP you will need to configure your wallpaper settings. Select the option to set live wallpaper and then select "Orbital LWP".
Now you can configure the behaviour of Orbital LWP. The settings can be accessed using the Android live wallpaper settings menu or the button below.
Other PuZZleDucK apps on the Play store.
Take a look at the source code for Orbitals LWP.
